title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7407.4 - Limitation of incoming printed material and publications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7407.4 - Limitation of incoming printed material and publications

State Regulations
OCFS may adopt policies and procedures which limit the
amount of printed material and other paper materials retained within a
resident's living area, in furtherance of the safety, security and good order
of the facility, especially safety from the risk of fire. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7407.4

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
